name: S.A.D.: Rewriting
description:
A game that tells a slightly different story, in fact, about a subject which is not much talked about, even in the world of games. It's always there but never spoken, whether in the serials, movies, books and even in some games, most see as timidity, whether it is excessive or not... We are talking about Social Phobia or Social Anxiety Disorder.

The main objective of the game is to bring a little of this day-to-day, showing how difficult it can be to live with it and at the same time extolling its chances of overcoming. For this we bring situations with simple goals for most people, but for the character can be a challenge. We then put a different goal at each stage, to match each place.
